Significantly absent in the long obituaries for Pope Francis in both the New York Times and the Washington Post were mentions of his deep concern for the suffering of the Palestinian people in Gaza. In Francis‚Äôs last public message on Easter Sunday, just hours before he died, he had called for a ceasefire in Gaza, and condemned the ‚Äúdeplorable humanitarian situation‚Äù there.
RIP #PopeFrancis #CeasefireNow
